definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: Looking market outlook, policy frequent positive side, up and down the market short - term dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 展望后市，政策面利好频出，大盘短期上下两难。

sentences.english: News over the weekend to maintain calm, the market is expected to deliver a non-positive .
sentences.chinese: 周末消息面保持平静，市场预期的利好无一兑现。

sentences.english: Chances are good that policymakers will indeed relax policy.
sentences.chinese: 决策者确实放宽政策是重大利好。

sentences.english: However, there is one thing the bulls have that the bears do not: seasonality .
sentences.chinese: 不过多头有一个独享的利好因素，那就是季节性因素。

sentences.english: "The Curse of the Mogul" argues that this upside was a mirage.
sentences.chinese: 《巨头的诅咒》一书却认为，这些利好只是海市蜃楼。

sentences.english: Orders for durable goods and a private payroll report were surprisingly good.
sentences.chinese: 耐用品订单与私人工资单报告出奇地利好。

sentences.english: That said, saving could be good news for companies.
sentences.chinese: 一般认为，储蓄对公司方面是利好消息。

sentences.english: Besides, your romantic attractions are excellent. In a word, it is a good week.
sentences.chinese: 另外一项利好是邂逅运佳，总之是不错的一个星期。

sentences.english: Excluding the favorable impact of foreign exchange, sales increased 4 percent.
sentences.chinese: 排除外汇汇率的利好影响，销售额增加4%。

sentences.english: Yet the report on the economy was good news.
sentences.chinese: 然而日本经济报告却是一大利好。

definition: slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
turning point/breaking point/inflexion point (math., a point of a curve at which the curvature changes sign)
extent of a rise (in prices etc)/amount of increase/growth (typically expressed as a percentage)
market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
bull market (prices appear to be rising)
